mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AT_CST_FT( CSR_IDENTIFER, FT_INST, RIDS, RECEPIT_COUNT, OWN_TAX_STATION, OWN_DECLARE_TIME, OWN_LEVY_TYPE, OWN_TAX_TYPE, OWN_TAX_RATE, ADD_TAX_OWNER, ADD_TAX_STATION, ADD_TAX_DECLARE_TIME, ADD_TAX_LEVY_TYPE, ADD_TAX_TYPE, ADD_TAX_RATE, OPERATOR, REMARK ) VALUES( #{csrIdentifer}, #{ftInst}, #{rids}, #{recepitCount}, #{ownTaxStation}, #{ownDeclareTime}, #{ownLevyType}, #{ownTaxType}, #{ownTaxRate}, #{addTaxOwner}, #{addTaxStation}, #{addTaxDeclareTime}, #{addTaxLevyType}, #{addTaxType}, #{addTaxRate}, #{operator}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID as id, CSR_IDENTIFER as csrIdentifer, FT_INST as ftInst, RIDS as rids, RECEPIT_COUNT as recepitCount, OWN_TAX_STATION as ownTaxStation, OWN_DECLARE_TIME as ownDeclareTime, OWN_LEVY_TYPE as ownLevyType, OWN_TAX_TYPE as ownTaxType, OWN_TAX_RATE as ownTaxRate, ADD_TAX_OWNER as addTaxOwner, ADD_TAX_STATION as addTaxStation, ADD_TAX_DECLARE_TIME as addTaxDeclareTime, ADD_TAX_LEVY_TYPE as addTaxLevyType, ADD_TAX_TYPE as addTaxType, ADD_TAX_RATE as addTaxRate, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_CST_FT WHERE ID=#{id}

SELECT ID as id, CSR_IDENTIFER as csrIdentifer, FT_INST as ftInst, RIDS as rids, RECEPIT_COUNT as recepitCount, OWN_TAX_STATION as ownTaxStation, OWN_DECLARE_TIME as ownDeclareTime, OWN_LEVY_TYPE as ownLevyType, OWN_TAX_TYPE as ownTaxType, OWN_TAX_RATE as ownTaxRate, ADD_TAX_OWNER as addTaxOwner, ADD_TAX_STATION as addTaxStation, ADD_TAX_DECLARE_TIME as addTaxDeclareTime, ADD_TAX_LEVY_TYPE as addTaxLevyType, ADD_TAX_TYPE as addTaxType, ADD_TAX_RATE as addTaxRate, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_CST_FT WHERE CSR_IDENTIFER=#{csrIdentifer}

SELECT ID as id, CSR_IDENTIFER as csrIdentifer, FT_INST as ftInst, RIDS as rids, RECEPIT_COUNT as recepitCount, OWN_TAX_STATION as ownTaxStation, OWN_DECLARE_TIME as ownDeclareTime, OWN_LEVY_TYPE as ownLevyType, OWN_TAX_TYPE as ownTaxType, OWN_TAX_RATE as ownTaxRate, ADD_TAX_OWNER as addTaxOwner, ADD_TAX_STATION as addTaxStation, ADD_TAX_DECLARE_TIME as addTaxDeclareTime, ADD_TAX_LEVY_TYPE as addTaxLevyType, ADD_TAX_TYPE as addTaxType, ADD_TAX_RATE as addTaxRate, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_CST_FT a WHERE EXISTS ( select CSR_IDENTIFER from AT_CSR_BASIC c where c.OPERATOR=#{userId} and a.CSR_IDENTIFER = c.CSR_IDENTIFER )
